ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Earliest_Start_Time__c)), OR( NOT(ISNUMBER(Earliest_Start_Time__c)), LEN(Earliest_Start_Time__c) < 3, VALUE(Earliest_Start_Time__c) < 0, VALUE(Earliest_Start_Time__c) > 2400, VALUE(RIGHT(Earliest_Start_Time__c,2)) > 59 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Earliest Start Time must be number and between 0000 and 2400
